semantic_identifier: [GOLD-16]: Update positioning generation to prioritize and cite captured customer language/evidence
title: Update positioning generation to prioritize and cite captured customer language/evidence

sections.text: Modify the positioning recommendation generator to explicitly retrieve the most relevant customer language/evidence records for the target segment and incorporate them into value props, differentiators, and objection handling. Ensure outputs include lightweight citations (source type + artifact reference) and degrade gracefully when evidence is sparse (clearly flagging low-evidence recommendations instead of producing generic claims). Add guardrails to prevent using uncited assertions when evidence is available.
